guideline_summaries: AHA/ACC/HFSA 2022 Heart Failure Guidelines: Recommends ACE inhibitors or ARBs as first-line therapy for HFrEF patients with beta-blockers and aldosterone antagonists
ESC 2021 Heart Failure Guidelines: Emphasizes early initiation of guideline-directed medical therapy and device therapy consideration for eligible patients
NICE Heart Failure Guidelines 2018 (Updated 2021): Provides structured approach to diagnosis using natriuretic peptides and echocardiography with lifestyle management recommendations
AHA 2022 Heart Failure Self-Care Guidelines: Evidence-based recommendations for patient education, dietary sodium restriction, and daily weight monitoring
